channel.title: Bhagini Sahar on Sonam
channel.description: Recent content in Bhagini Sahar on Sonam

item.title: NCA CTF:Bhagini Sahar writeup
item.description: Bhagini Sahar is the CTF challenge related to OSINT hosted by NCA@Nepal. NCA@Nepal is an active CTF and cybersecurity community in Nepal. A short description and image are provided in the challenge. Whenever we need to find the geolocation of an image, we can use Google Image Search, Yandex, or Bing. I used Google Images to gather information about the above image, and I discovered that it is located in Chongqing, China
